summary.name: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum
summary.tagline: 10% Vitamin C serum formulated for Oily, Combination skin.

ingredient_focus: Vitamin C supports brightening and even tone.
Hyaluronic Acid supports hydration without heaviness.

usage.how_to_use: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen
usage_tips: Introduce gradually if skin is sensitive.

safety_notes: Avoid mixing with strong exfoliants in the same routine.
